metadata.description: Developer tools and Claude Code plugins by Jonah Schulte

plugins.name: stackshift
plugins.description: Reverse engineering toolkit with detection types (monorepo, nx, turborepo), dual routes (Greenfield/Brownfield/Upgrade), Gear 6.5 validation, batch processing, and cruise control. Achieves 100% spec coverage with GitHub Spec Kit integration.

plugins.name: distillery
